name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: You guys, today President Trump gave a big speech on National Security. He focused on the three biggest threats to our country -- Russia, North Korea, and Omarosa.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: At one point he said, "We will never lose sight of our values and their capacity to inspire, uplift, and renew." Then he realized someone left an old Obama speech in the teleprompter. "That doesn't sound like me at all. What just happened? Wall. Come on, Donald, improvise."

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: It was revealed that the Pentagon had a top secret program to investigate UFOâ€™s and aliens. Which is why Trump announced plans to build a dome over the earth and make E.T. pay for it.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: There was an 11-hour power outage at the airport in Atlanta yesterday. And people were stranded on the tarmac for six hours. Don't worry, though, flight attendants came through every hour with a thimble-size cup of room temperature water.
